title: Tennis Broadcaster Patrick McEnroe on What's Next for The Sport
description: Patrick McEnroe, tennis executive, broadcaster and ESPN analyst, discusses U.S. tennis talent and the physical demands of the sport with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Patrick McEnroe, tennis executive, broadcaster and ESPN analyst, discusses U.S. tennis talent and the physical demands of the sport with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
